Package com.example.circleapp.Firebase

Class ImageManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.circleapp.Firebase.ImageManager
public class ImageManager extends Object
This class is used to manage images with Firebase Cloud Storage.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    ImageManager.ImagesCallback
    Interface for asynchronous callback when retrieving images.

  • Method Details

    • getPosters

      public void getPosters(ImageManager.ImagesCallback callback)
      Retrieves posters from Firebase Cloud Storage.
      Parameters:
      callback - The callback interface for handling the retrieved images.

      Parameters:

    • deleteImage

      Deletes an image from Firebase Cloud Storage.
      Parameters:
      imageURL - The URL of the image to be deleted.

    • hasImage

      public boolean hasImage()
      Checks if an ImageView has an image set.
      Returns:
      true if an image is set, false otherwise.

      Initiates image selection process for an event poster.

      Uploads a poster image to Firebase storage.

      onSuccessListener - Listener for a successful upload.
